entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
